name: Starfighter
overview: A 2-player cooperative shooter written with SEUCK and published in Magic Disk 64 1988/07, and also in Digital Marketing PD #137. In this game, as the name suggests, you control a starfighter through hostile terrain, it is tougher than the, already very difficult Solid I game that released in the same issue of Magic Disk 7/88, and it feels like the only way to get through it is to have a second cooperative player, so luckily you can have one!
